Command.name: <MouseButton_MouseAction>
Command.content: 'Script by Lindsay Adam www.pcbyvoice.com 2011 Private Declare Sub mouse_event Lib "user32" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, _ ByVal dx As Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, _ ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) Sub Main If ListVar1 = "LEFT Mouse Hold Down" then mouse_event (2, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "LEFT Mouse Release" then mouse_event (4, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "RIGHT Mouse Hold Down" then mouse_event (8, 0,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "RIGHT Mouse Release" then mouse_event (16, 0,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.name: Mouse Location
Command.description: Copies the Current Mouse Position To the Clipboard
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function
Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y ' Clipboard clip ' End Sub

Command.name: Mute Sound
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Sound Off" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Esc}" Wait 1 SendKeys "msconfig" SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys "+{Tab}{Right 3}{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Strike <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) HeardWord "scratch","that" Next End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}{Enter 2}{Tab}"+ListVar1+". " HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter}{Tab}"+ListVar1+". " HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Tab Upper <1to20>

Command.name: Page Up Back
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition"press alt tab" SendKeys "{PgUp}" EmulateRecognition"press alt tab" End Sub

Command.name: Page Down Back
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition"press alt tab" SendKeys "{PgDn}" EmulateRecognition"press alt tab" End Sub

Command.name: Bracket That
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" SendKeys"{[}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"]" End Sub

Command.name: Bracket Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" SendKeys"{[}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"]" Wait .5 SendKeys"^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Quote That
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" SendKeys"{""}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"{""}" End Sub

Command.name: Paren That
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" SendKeys"{(}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"{)}" End Sub

Command.name: Paren Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" SendKeys"{(}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"{)}" Wait .5 SendKeys"^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Angle Bracket That
Command.content: Sub Main Dim saveClipboard As String SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 saveClipboard = "<" & Clipboard & ">" saveClipboard = Replace$(saveClipboard, "< ", "<") SendKeys saveClipboard End Sub

Command.name: Brace That
Command.content: Sub Main Dim saveClipboard As String SendKeys"^c" Wait 0.1 saveClipboard = "{{}" & Clipboard & "}" saveClipboard = Replace$(saveClipboard, "{{} ", "{{}") saveClipboard = Replace$(saveClipboard, " }", "}") SendKeys saveClipboard End Sub

Command.name: Brace Back
Command.content: Sub Main Dim saveClipboard As String SendKeys"^c" Wait 0.1 saveClipboard = "{{}" & Clipboard & "}" saveClipboard = Replace$(saveClipboard, "{{} ", "{{}") saveClipboard = Replace$(saveClipboard, " }", "}") SendKeys saveClipboard Wait .2 SendKeys"^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: <DragonBar>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Cling Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to cling mode" if ListVar1 = "Top Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to docked to top Mode" if ListVar1 = "Bottom Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to docked to bottom mode" if ListVar1 = "Floating Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to floating mode" if ListVar1 = "Modern Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to modern mode" if ListVar1 = "New Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to modern mode" if ListVar1 = "Tray Icon Mode" then HeardWord "change DragonBar to tray icon mode" End Sub

Command.name: Full Screenshot To Printer
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Prtsc}" ' Using Dragon Pad will print the screen full size ' if you want to on a page try something like WordPad ' using ShellExecute"WordPad" as your next line EmulateRecognition"Start DragonPad" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^p" Wait 0.2 SendKeys"~" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Full ScreenShot To File
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Prtsc}" ' Use something like WordPad if you want the screenshot on one page ' so line below would be ShellExecute "WordPad" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\Caps-On" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Restart Windows
Command.content: Sub Main TTSPlayString "restart windows?" If MsgBox("Windows will now be restarted, before clicking Ok you should make " _ + "sure that all necessary files are saved and the Dragon user profile is " _ + "saved if required", vbOkCancel ) = vbOk Then ShellExecute "shutdown.exe -r -t 00 -f" End If End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^+{Space "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Zoom <In_Out>
Command.content: 'Script copyright Mr Wilke, RW Programs 2015 Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long Const VK_CTRL = 17 Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Select Case ListVar1 Case "In" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA, 0) Case "Out" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA, 0) End Select keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) End Sub

Command.name: Move <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgVocabularyEditor,0,,0) Wait 1 SendKeys "%i" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%r" End Sub

Command.name: Search Vocabulary For <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgVocabularyEditor,0,,0) Wait 1 SendKeys "%r" Wait .2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 1 Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgVocabularyEditor,0,,0) Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Bookmark <10to50>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "["+ListVar1+"]" End Sub

Command.name: Search Evernote For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "switch to Evernote" Wait 3 SendKeys "{F6}" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Search OneNote For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "switch to OneNote" Wait 3 SendKeys "^e" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Space Bookmark <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "1" Then SendKeys "[01]" If ListVar1 = "2" Then SendKeys "[02]" If ListVar1 = "3" Then SendKeys "[03]" If ListVar1 = "4" Then SendKeys "[04]" If ListVar1 = "5" Then SendKeys "[05]" If ListVar1 = "6" Then SendKeys "[06]" If ListVar1 = "7" Then SendKeys "[07]" If ListVar1 = "8" Then SendKeys "[08]" If ListVar1 = "9" Then SendKeys "[09]" End Sub

Command.name: Space Bookmark <10to50>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "["+ListVar1+"]" End Sub

Command.name: Undo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^z" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Redo <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "^y" Next Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Line <1to100> Times
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "_" Next SendKeys " " End Sub

Command.name: Zoom In <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Pad+ "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Zoom Out <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Pad- "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Print Document
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^p" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Close Without Saving
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "*" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^w" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "n" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "n" End Sub

Command.name: Minimize
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "n" End Sub

Command.name: Maximize
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "x" End Sub

Command.name: Restore All Windows
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}+m" End Sub

Command.name: Minimize All Windows
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}m" End Sub

Command.name: Search For <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%d" Wait 0.5 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: <Punctuation> Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys ""+ListVar1+"" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Restore
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Space}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "r" End Sub

Command.name: Open Startup Folder
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}r" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "shell:startup" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Legal Roman <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{(}" if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "i" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "ii" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "iii" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "iv" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "v" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "vi" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "vii" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "viii" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "ix" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "x" If ListVar1 = "11" Then SendKeys "xi" If ListVar1 = "12" Then SendKeys "xii" If ListVar1 = "13" Then SendKeys "xiii" If ListVar1 = "14" Then SendKeys "xiv" If ListVar1 = "15" Then SendKeys "xv" If ListVar1 = "16" Then SendKeys "xvi" If ListVar1 = "17" Then SendKeys "xvii" If ListVar1 = "18" Then SendKeys "xviii" If ListVar1 = "19" Then SendKeys "xix" If ListVar1 = "20" Then SendKeys "xx" SendKeys "{)}" End Sub

Command.name: Sample Change <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Home}" Wait .5 SendKeys "^h" Wait .1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait .2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture Screen
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Prtsc}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG To Printer
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ' Using WordPad will fit the screenshot on one page ' if you want the full size screen print you could try ' something like ShellExecute"MSPaint" as your next line ShellExecute"WordPad" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^p" Wait 0.2 SendKeys"~" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: Capture PNG To File
Command.content: Sub Main SetMicrophone 0 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" ShellExecute "mspaint" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "~" TTSPlayString "name" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" SetMicrophone 1 End Sub

Command.name: PS
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter 2}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "PS:" Wait 0.2 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: Paste Line
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter}^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "+{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Down <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Down "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Up <1to100>
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "sound check" End Sub

Command.name: Volume Level <1to100>
Command.description: Change your volume output level from 1 to 100 (maximum)
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Sound Level <1to100>
Command.description: Change your volume output level from 1 to 100 (maximum)
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" Wait 1 SendKeys"{Up "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Next <Character>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^h" Wait .5 SendKeys ""+ListVar1+"{Enter}" Wait .5 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Capture Screen To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Prtsc}" If ListVar1 = "Evernote" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to Evernote" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Word Perfect" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Go To Desktop <0to9>
Command.description: Allows You to Switch From the 1st to 9th Virtual Desktop (courtesy of Daryl Davis)
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Left 9}", True If (ListVar1 <> "1" ) Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right " & CStr(CInt(ListVar1)-1) & "}", True End Sub

Command.name: Select Everything
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{End}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^+{Home}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete Everything
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{End}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^+{Home}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete All
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Command Mode
Command.content: HeardWord "command","mode","on" Wait 3000 HeardWord "command","mode","off"

Command.name: Bold And Italicize <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "select", ListVar1 Wait .3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^b" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^i" Wait .3 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Bold And Italics <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "select", ListVar1 Wait .3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^b" Wait 0.1 SendKeys"^i" Wait .3 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Bold And Underline <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "select", ListVar1 Wait .3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^b" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^u" Wait .3 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Build A Command <dictation>
Command.description: Copies highlighted boilerplate text into a new Dragon command
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait .3 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Calculate <dictation>
Command.description: Thanks to Mike Jerry for this command
Command.content:
Sub Main
Dim operator As String Dim firstnum As String Dim secondnum As String Dim result As String
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") Then operator = "Plus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "+") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") Then operator = "Minus" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "-") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") Then operator = "Times" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "×") End If
If InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") Then operator = "Divided By" index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "÷") End If
ShellExecute "Calc" Wait 1 'Separate out the numbers firstnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 1) secondnum = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 1, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 1) 'Strip out any commas from the numbers 'cuz Calculator don't like 'em firstnum = Replace$(firstnum, ",", "") secondnum = Replace$(secondnum, ",", "") SendKeys firstnum Wait 0.1 If operator = "Plus" Then SendKeys "{+}" If operator = "Minus" Then SendKeys "-" If operator = "Divided By" Then SendKeys "/" If operator = "Times" Then SendKeys "{*}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys secondnum Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%{F4}" Wait 0.2 'Now to format the result to limit decimal places to two digits and add commas every three digits to large numbers result = Clipboard 'If both decimal and integer > 3 If InStr(CStr(result), ".") And Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If decimal only If InStr(CStr(result), ".") Then result = Format( result , "#.##" ) GoTo Finish End If 'If integer > 3 only If Len(CStr(result)) > 3 Then result = Format( result , "#,0" ) End If Finish:
SendKeys result
End Sub

Command.name: Sample Start <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then ShellExecute "MSACCESS" If ListVar1 = "Auto Transcribe" Then HeardWord "Open","AutoTranscribe","Folder","Agent" If ListVar1 = "Calculator" Then ShellExecute "Calc" If ListVar1 = "Clock" Then ShellExecute "ms-clock:" If ListVar1 = "Computer" Then HeardWord "open","computer" If ListVar1 = "Defender" Then HeardWord "open","Windows","Defender" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "open","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Evernote" Then ShellExecute "Evernote" If ListVar1 = "Edge" Then HeardWord "open","Microsoft","Edge" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then ShellExecute "EXCEL" If ListVar1 = "Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "File Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "Windows Explorer" Then ShellExecute "Explorer" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then ShellExecute "Firefox" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then ShellExecute "FRONTPG" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then ShellExecute "CHROME" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then ShellExecute "IEXPLORE" If ListVar1 = "iTunes" Then AppBringUp "C:\Program Files\iTunes\iTunes.exe" If ListVar1 = "Malwarebytes" Then ShellExecute "mbam" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then ShellExecute "Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then ShellExecute "Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then ShellExecute "Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then ShellExecute "MSPAINT" If ListVar1 = "PowerPoint" Then ShellExecute "PowerPNT" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then ShellExecute "MSPUB" If ListVar1 = "QuickBooks" Then ShellExecute "QBW32" If ListVar1 = "Run" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}r" If ListVar1 = "Sound" Then ShellExecute "SndVol" If ListVar1 = "System Properties" Then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Pause}" If ListVar1 = "Task Manager" Then SendKeys "^+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then ShellExecute "Winword" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then ShellExecute "Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then ShellExecute "wpwin18" End Sub

Command.name: Scroll <Direction> <1to300>
Command.description: Mouse Up, Down, Left or Right 13 to 300
Command.content: Sub Main ButtonClick 4,1 Wait 0.5 offset = Val( ListVar2) if ListVar1 = "Up" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -offset if ListVar1 = "Down" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, offset if ListVar1 = "Left" then SetMousePosition 2, -offset, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right" then SetMousePosition 2, offset, 0 End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Current" HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case "Desktop" ClearDesktop HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case "Taskbar" SetMousePosition 0, 1832, 1073 Wait 0.1 ButtonClick 1, 1 Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case "Start" SetMousePosition 0, 26, 1059 Wait 0.1 ButtonClick 1, 1 Wait 0.1 HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" Case Else HeardWord "DISPLAY numbers" End Select End Sub

Command.name: Copy
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" TTSPlayString "copied" End Sub

Command.name: Sample Indent
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim currentLine, leadingCharacter, firstWord, splitted() As String Dim lineLength, numberSpaces, numberTabs, tabAsSpaces As Integer Dim foundWhiteSpace, convertTabsToSpaces, addExtraTab, removeTab As Boolean
tabAsSpaces = 3' get these from a .INI? SaveSetting GetSetting convertTabsToSpaces = true
SendKeys "{Home 2}", 1 SendKeys "+{End}", 1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c", 1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{End}", 1 currentLine = Clipboard Wait 0.5 lineLength = Len(currentLine) If lineLength = 0 Then Exit All ' Personal choice - if I want to add blank lines I will do it by saying "Press Enter" If currentLine = "Sub Main" Then SendKeys "{Down}", 1 ' make the assumption that we're starting out with an empty command SendKeys "{Home}", 1 Wait 0.2 For iteration = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next iteration Exit All End If addExtraTab = false splitted = Split (currentLine, " ") firstWord = splitted(0) If firstWord = "Do" Or firstWord = "do" Or firstWord = "For" Or firstWord = "for" _ Or firstWord = "If" Or firstWord = "if" Or firstWord = "Else" Or firstWord = "else" _ Or firstWord = "Select" Or firstWord = "select" Or firstWord = "While" Or firstWord = "while" _ Or firstWord = "Type" Or firstWord = "type" Or firstWord = "Case" Or firstWord = "case" Then addExtraTab = true End If removeTab = false If firstWord = "End" Or firstWord = "end" Or firstWord = "Loop" Or firstWord = "loop" _ Or firstWord = "Next" Or firstWord = "next" Or firstWord = "Wend" Or firstWord = "wend" Then removeTab = true End If numberSpaces = 0 numberTabs = 0 For iteration = 1 to lineLength foundWhiteSpace = false leadingCharacter = Mid (currentLine, iteration, 1) If leadingCharacter = " " Then numberSpaces = numberSpaces + 1 foundWhiteSpace = true End If If leadingCharacter = Chr(9) Then numberTabs = numberTabs + 1 foundWhiteSpace = true End If If foundWhiteSpace = false Then Exit For Next iteration SendKeys "{ENTER}", 1 Wait 0.2 If numberSpaces > 0 Then For spaces = 1 to numberSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If If numberTabs > 0 Then For tabs = 1 to numberTabs If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Tab}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If Next tabs End If Wait 0.2 If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Tab}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If If addExtraTab = true Then If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Tab}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Space}", 1 Next spaces End If End If If removeTab = true And addExtraTab = true Then If convertTabsToSpaces = false Then SendKeys "{Delete}", 1 Else For spaces = 1 to tabAsSpaces SendKeys "{Backspace}", 1 Next spaces End If End If End Sub

Command.name: Search <web>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" website = ListVar1 Wait 0.2 If website = "Ask" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If website = "Bing" Then ShellExecute "http://www.bing.com/" If website = "Duck Duck" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If website = "Duck Duck Go" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If website = "eBay" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ebay.com/" If website = "Google" Then ShellExecute "http://www.google.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "no-brainer" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If website = "no-brainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If website = "Nuance Knowledgebase" Then ShellExecute "http://nuance.custhelp.com/" If website = "Quick Tips" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/index.cfm/wiki/knowbrainer-quick-tips/" If website = "Wikipedia" Then ShellExecute "http://wikipedia.org/" If website = "Yahoo" Then ShellExecute "http://www.yahoo.com/" If website = "You Tube" Then ShellExecute "https://www.youtube.com/" If website = "Dictionary" Then ShellExecute "http://dictionary.reference.com/" If website = "Thesaurus" Then ShellExecute "http://www.thesaurus.com/" Wait 3 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Capture Window To <AppList>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%{Prtsc}" If ListVar1 = "Evernote" Then EmulateRecognition "switch to Evernote" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%Esc" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "%+{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Word Perfect" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "%{Tab}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "select", ListVar1 Wait 0.6 SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 SendKeys"{(}" SendKeys"^v" SendKeys"{)}" Wait 0.3 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^+{Home}{Del}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main GoToSleep AppBringUp "C:\Windows\System32\SndVol.exe" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Sound On

Command.name: Magnify In <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Pad+}" Wait 0.2 Next End Sub

Command.name: Magnify Out <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To Val(ListVar1) SendKeys "{WindowsHold}{Pad-}" Wait 0.2 Next End Sub

Command.name: Back <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To (ListVar1) SendKeys "%{Left}" Wait 1 Next End Sub

Command.name: Forward <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main For i = 1 To (ListVar1) SendKeys "%{Right}" Wait 1 Next End Sub

Command.name: Page Down <1to100> Back

Command.name: Page Up <1to100>

Command.name: <keyname> Hold Down
Command.content:
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_ALT = &h12 Const VK_SPACE = &h20
Sub Main If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "ALT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SPACE Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SPACE,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.name: <keyname> Release
Command.content:
' Script Lindsay Adam 2010 www.pcbyvoice.com ' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the left Windows key, ' control key, shift key and alt key Const VK_LWIN = &h5B Const VK_CTRL = &h11 Const VK_SHIFT = &h10 Const VK_SPACE = &h20
Sub Main If ListVar1 = "WINDOWS Key" Then keybd_event(VK_LWIN,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "CONTROL Key" Then keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SHIFT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SHIFT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "ALT Key" Then keybd_event(VK_ALT,0,0,0) If ListVar1 = "SPACE Key" Then keybd_event(VK_SPACE,0,0,0) End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "first" then SendKeys "^1" if ListVar1 = "second" then SendKeys "^2" if ListVar1 = "third" then SendKeys "^3" if ListVar1 = "fourth" then SendKeys "^4" if ListVar1 = "fifth" then SendKeys "^5" if ListVar1 = "sixth" then SendKeys "^6" if ListVar1 = "seventh" then SendKeys "^7" if ListVar1 = "eighth" then SendKeys "^8" if ListVar1 = "ninth" then SendKeys "^9" End Sub

Command.name: Search Windows For <dictation>
Command.content: Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for Escape and Control keys Const VK_CTRL = &H11 Const VK_ESC = &H1B Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,2,0) Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.name: <1st_9th> Desktop
Command.description: Switch Between Windows Desktops
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Left 9}" Wait 0.3 if ListVar1 = "first" then SendKeys "" if ListVar1 = "second" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right}" if ListVar1 = "third" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 2}" if ListVar1 = "fourth" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 3}" if ListVar1 = "fifth" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 4}" if ListVar1 = "sixth" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 5}" if ListVar1 = "seventh" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 6}" if ListVar1 = "eighth" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 7}" if ListVar1 = "ninth" then SendKeys "{WindowsHold}^{Right 8}" End Sub

Command.name: Start Medium Box
Command.content: Sub Main Begin Dialog UserDialog 780,266,title,.DialogFunc ' %GRID:10,7,1,1 TextBox 10,7,960,417,.TextBox1,1 OKButton 238,438,90,21,.OK '1st # horizontal, 2nd # vertical CancelButton 638,438,90,21,.Cancel End Dialog Dim dlg As UserDialog result = Dialog(dlg) If result=-1 Then ' If the user clicked OK, Clipboard dlg.textbox1 ' copy the text box contents to the clipboard SendKeys "^v" ' and then paste contents into the active application End If End Sub Function DialogFunc%(DlgItem$, Action%, SuppValue%) End Function

Command.name: Wheel <Direction> <1to1000>
Command.description: Special Thanks To Mr Wilkie for this script
Command.content: Declare Function mouse_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal dwFlags As Long, ByVal dx As _ Long, ByVal dy As Long, ByVal cButtons As Long, ByVal dwExtraInfo As Long) As Long Const WHEEL_DELTA = 120 Const MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL = &H800 'Courtesy of Mike Jerry Sub Main Select Case ListVar1 Case "Up" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Down" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_WHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Right" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) Case "Left" mouse_event(MOUSEEVENTF_HWHEEL, 0, 0, -WHEEL_DELTA*Val(ListVar2), 0) End Select End Sub

Command.name: Mouse <Direction> <1to5000>
Command.description: Mouse Up, Down, Left or Right 1 to 5000 pixels
Command.content: Sub Main offset = Val( ListVar2) if ListVar1 = "Up" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, -offset if ListVar1 = "Down" then SetMousePosition 2, 0, offset if ListVar1 = "Left" then SetMousePosition 2, -offset, 0 if ListVar1 = "Right" then SetMousePosition 2, offset, 0 End Sub

Command.name: Subscript <dictation>
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("Subscript That") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("Continue") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys( Format(Now, "hh:mmAM/PM") + Space(1) + "-" + Space(1) + Format (Now, "mmmm dd, yyyy")) End Sub

Command.name: Search <web> for <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main website = ListVar1 Wait 0.2 If website = "Ask" Then ShellExecute "http://www.ask.com/?o=0&l=dir" If website = "Bing" Then ShellExecute "http://www.bing.com/" If website = "Dragon Commands" Then ShellExecute "http://www.nuance.com/products/help/dragon/dragon-for-pc/scriptref/Content/GetStart1.htm" If website = "Dragon Help" Then HeardWord "open Dragon Help" If website = "Duck Duck" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If website = "Duck Duck Go" Then ShellExecute "https://duckduckgo.com/" If website = "Google" Then ShellExecute "http://www.google.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "no-brainer" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/" If website = "KnowBrainer Forum" Then ShellExecute "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/search.cfm" If website = "Nuance Knowledgebase" Then ShellExecute "http://nuance.custhelp.com/" If website = "Wikipedia" Then ShellExecute "http://wikipedia.org/" If website = "Yahoo" Then ShellExecute "http://www.yahoo.com/" If website = "You Tube" Then ShellExecute "https://www.youtube.com/" Wait 3 SendKeys ListVar2 Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Disable App Command <dictation>
Command.description: Build and name a new command
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgOptions,0,,0) Wait 1 if ListVar1 = "Correction" then SendKeys "" if ListVar1 = "Commands" then HeardWord "click","commands" if ListVar1 = "View" then HeardWord "click","view" if ListVar1 = "Appearance" then HeardWord "click","appearance" if ListVar1 = "Hotkeys" then HeardWord "click","hot keys" if ListVar1 = "Text-to-Speech" then HeardWord "click","playback" if ListVar1 = "Playback" then HeardWord "click","playback" if ListVar1 = "Miscellaneous" then HeardWord "click","miscellaneous" if ListVar1 = "Data" then HeardWord "click","data" if ListVar1 = "Dictation Box" then HeardWord "click","dictation box" if ListVar1 = "Dragon Anywhere" then HeardWord "click","Dragon Anywhere" if ListVar1 = "Upgrade To Legal" then HeardWord "click","Upgrade","To","Legal" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Replace <dictation>
Command.description: Say "Replace <dictation> with <dictation>" to use this command
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "with") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 5, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^+{Up}" 'Selects previous paragraph Wait 0.4 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing Wait 1 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the current paragraph End End Sub

Command.name: Sample Say <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type into or correct
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"^c" Wait 0.1 lastCharacter = Mid$(Clipboard$(), Len (Clipboard$()),1) Wait 0.1 Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 'This line tests if the last character of the selected text is a space if (StrComp(lastCharacter, " ") = 0) Then Clipboard ListVar1 & " " End If SendKeys"^v" End Sub

Command.name: Make It <dictation>
Command.content: 'Script by Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2019 'if selecting a word by double-clicking on it or by voice the following script 'will check if it has a space after it and if it is capitalised and 'subsequently the text you are replacing it with will meet the same criteria. 'In other words the script will test the ambiguity of Dragon selection 'and replace the selected text with what you said in an appropriate format Sub Main Dim hasSpace As Boolean hasSpace = False 'copy the text selected SendKeys"^c" Wait 0.1 'work out the last character to see it as a space below lastCharacter = Mid$(Clipboard$(), Len (Clipboard$()),1) 'find out the first character to see if it is a capital letter below Wait 0.3 firstCharacter = Left(Clipboard$(),1) Wait 0.3 'now assign what you said as a replacement to the clipboard Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 'This line tests if the last character of the selected text is a space 'if it is it adds a space to the replacement text in the clipboard 'and it also sets the hasSpace to true if it is a space If (StrComp(lastCharacter, " ") = 0) Then Clipboard ListVar1 & " " hasSpace = True End If 'this line checks if the first letter of the selected text is a capital letter 'and if it is it will capitalise the text in the clipboard If firstCharacter = UCase(firstCharacter) Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) 'if also has a space at the end of it then a space will be added 'to the text in the clipboard as well Wait 0.3 If hasSpace = True Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) & " " Wait 0.3 End If End If SendKeys"^v" End Sub

Command.name: Period Line <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "." Wait 0.1 SendKeys "+{Enter}" Wait 1 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) End Sub

Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking14\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim engCtrl As New DgnEngineControl engCtrl.Register engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("select " & ListVar1) engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("Superscript That") Wait .5 engCtrl.RecognitionMimic("Continue") engCtrl.UnRegister(False) End Sub

Command.name: Start <dictation>
Command.description: Special Thanks To Lindsay Adams for this script
Command.content: Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for Escape and Control keys Const VK_CTRL = &H11 Const VK_ESC = &H1B Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,0,0) keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) keybd_event(VK_ESC,0,2,0) Wait 1 SendKeys ListVar1 + "~" Wait 1 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Find Network Mouse Position
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools ' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command Option Explicit Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function
Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y ' Clipboard clip ' TTSPlayString "done" End Sub

Command.name: Sample KnowBrainer Login
Command.content:
'#Reference {EAB22AC0-30C1-11CF-A7EB-0000C05BAE0B}#1.1#0#C:\Windows\SysWOW64\ieframe.dll#Microsoft Internet Controls#SHDocVw '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\PROGRA~2\Nuance\NATURA~1\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools 'Script Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2015 www.pcbyvoice.com Const READYSTATE_COMPLETE = 4 ' Declare Internet Explorer object Dim IE As SHDocVw.InternetExplorer Sub Main MsgBox "The first time you run this command you will see this message box. After the command completes you will likely get a message that your login credentials are invalid. Please open the command and change the username and password on lines 27 and 28. Then remove line 6 which is this message." ' create instance of InternetExplorer Set IE = New InternetExplorer ' using your newly created instance of Internet Explorer With IE .Visible = True .Navigate2 "http://www.knowbrainer.com/forums/forum/index.cfm" ' Wait until page we are navigating to is loaded Do While .Busy Loop Do Loop Until .ReadyState = READYSTATE_COMPLETE ' the username and password values will not exist if already logged in ' so no need to fill in the values and go straight to Next On Error Resume Next If Err Then 'Do Nothing Else ' When the page is fully loaded enter your username and password ' you will need to set these appropriately With .Document.forms("login" ) .FTVAR_USERNAMEFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR USER NAME HERE" .FTVAR_PASSWORDFRM.value = "TYPE YOUR PASSWORD HERE" .submit End With ' Wait until fully logged in Do While .Busy Loop End If
'.Navigate2 "https://caaware.dor.ca.gov/aware5/VR/Landing.aspx#=y"
End With ' Tidy Up Set IE = Nothing End Sub

Command.name: System Information
Command.description: Contributed by Mr
Command.content: '#Reference #Microsoft.VisualBasic, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Reference #System.Management, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a, processorArchitecture=MSIL '#Language "WWB.NET" 'Example script by RWilke Imports System.Management Imports Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices Function GetCPUInfo() As String Dim strCPUInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim query As New SelectQuery( "Win32_Processor" ) Dim search As New ManagementObjectSearcher( query ) Dim info As ManagementObject For Each info In search.Get() strCPUInfo += "CPU:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "Name" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cores / Threads:" + vbTab + info( "NumberOfCores" ) + " / " + info( "NumberOfLogicalProcessors" ) + vbCrLf strCPUInfo += "Cache:" + vbTab + vbTab + info( "L2CacheSize" ) + " KB L2 / " + info( "L3CacheSize" ) + " KB L3" + vbCrLf Next Return strCPUInfo End Function Function GetComputerInfo() As String Dim computerInfo As New Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Computer Dim strComputerInfo As String = String.Empty() Dim lTotalMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.TotalPhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) Dim lAvailableMem As Long = computerInfo.Info.AvailablePhysicalMemory / (1024*1024) strComputerInfo += "Physical Memory:" + vbTab + lTotalMem.ToString() + " GB Total" _ + " / " + lAvailableMem.ToString() + " GB Available" + " / " _ + (Round(100-(100/lTotalMem*lAvailableMem))).ToString()+ " % Used" + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "Operating System:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSFullName + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Platform:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSPlatform + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Version:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.OSVersion + vbCrLf strComputerInfo += "OS Language:" + vbTab + computerInfo.Info.InstalledUICulture.ToString() + vbCrLf Return strComputerInfo End Function Sub Main Dim s As String = String.Empty() s += GetCPUInfo() s += GetComputerInfo() s += vbCrLf + vbCrLf + "Click Yes to save to a file, click No to quit" + vbCrLf If MsgBox( s, vbYesNo ) = vbYes Then Dim saveFileDialog As New Microsoft.Win32.SaveFileDialog() saveFileDialog.Filter = "txt files (*.txt)|*.txt" saveFileDialog.ShowDialog() System.IO.File.WriteAllText(saveFileDialog.FileName, GetCPUInfo & GetComputerInfo ()) End If End Sub

Command.name: Tab Space
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Tab}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Add Paragraph
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter 2}{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: Add Line
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter}{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: Add Fillin
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys " []{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: Backspace Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Backspace}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Backspace <1to20> Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Backspace "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Delete <1to20> Back
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Del "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Save Document
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^s" End Sub

Command.name: Save File
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^s" Wait 1 TTSPlayString "saved" End Sub

Command.name: Tab Next <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) Wait 1 SendKeys "{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Space Title <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 End Sub

Command.name: Find Mouse Position
Command.content:
Option Explicit
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type
Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type
' declare Win32 API functions
Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long
Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long
Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" ()
Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI
Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI
GetCursorPos pt
GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect
result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top
GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String
hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd)
clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y clip = clip & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "Wait 0.5" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) & _ "ButtonClick 1,1" & Chr(13) & Chr(10) ' Clipboard clip ' TTSPlayString "ready" End Sub

Command.name: Save As <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%f" Wait .5 SendKeys "a" Wait .2 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 1 SendKeys "%s" End Sub

Command.name: Save To <ComputerFolder> As <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{F12}" Wait 0.5 Str = ListVar2 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^l" Wait 0.5 If ListVar1 = "Documents" Then SendKeys "documents" If ListVar1 = "My Documents" Then SendKeys "documents" If ListVar1 = "Desktop" then SendKeys "desktop" If ListVar1 = "Downloads" then SendKeys "downloads" If ListVar1 = "Music" then SendKeys "music" If ListVar1 = "Pictures" then SendKeys "pictures" If ListVar1 = "Photographs" then SendKeys "pictures" If ListVar1 = "Videos" then SendKeys "videos" If ListVar1 = "AppData" then SendKeys "AppData" If ListVar1 = "OneDrive" then SendKeys "OneDrive" If ListVar1 = "Favorites" then SendKeys "Favorites" Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%s" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main value = CInt (ListVar2) If value > 99 Then For i = 1 To value/50 If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys"{Left 50}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys"{Right 50}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys"{Up 50}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys"{Down 50}" Next Else If ListVar1 = "Left" Then SendKeys "{Left "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Right" Then SendKeys "{Right "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End If End Sub

Command.name: New <Command> Mouse Command
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "Mouse","Location" Wait 1 HeardWord "add","command" Wait 4 if ListVar1 = "Global" then SendKeys "" if ListVar1 = "Application" then SendKeys "%a" if ListVar1 = "Window" then SendKeys "%f" SendKeys "%y{End}%r" Wait 1 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "{Enter}Wait .5{Enter}ButtonClick" Wait 1 SendKeys "%c" Wait 0.2 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: New App Command
Command.description: Creates a new command for the application your cursor is in
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: New App Command <dictation>
Command.description: Build and name a new command
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 1 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" End Sub

Command.name: New App Listing Command
Command.description: Creates a new command for the application your cursor is in
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait .5 SendKeys "%l" Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\caps-on" End Sub

Command.name: New App Listing Command <dictation>
Command.description: Creates a new command for the application your cursor is in
Command.content: Sub Main EmulateRecognition "Add Application Command" Wait 0.3 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t{Backspace}" Wait .5 SendKeys "%l" End Sub

Command.name: New App Mouse Command <dictation>
Command.content:
'#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools ' Script by Lindsay Adam, PCByVoice Ltd, www.pcbyvoice.com 2015 ' from an idea by Lunis Orcutt, KnowBrainer ' Please note there is no error handling and you may have to adjust the wait times ' at the end of the script when using SendKeys command
Type RECT Left As Long Top As Long Right As Long Bottom As Long End Type Type POINTAPI x As Long y As Long End Type ' declare Win32 API functions Declare Function GetCursorPos Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetCursorPos" (lpPoint As POINTAPI) As Long Declare Function GetWindowRect Lib "user32" _ Alias "GetWindowRect" (ByVal hwnd As Long, _ lpRect As RECT) As Long Declare Function GetForegroundWindow& Lib "user32" () Function GetWinCurPos(hwnd As Long) As POINTAPI Dim pt As POINTAPI Dim wRect As RECT Dim result As POINTAPI Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl GetCursorPos pt GetWindowRect hwnd, wRect result.x = pt.x - wRect.Left result.y = pt.y - wRect.Top GetWinCurPos = result End Function Sub Main
Dim hwnd As Long Dim result As POINTAPI Dim clip As String hwnd = GetForegroundWindow result = GetWinCurPos(hwnd) clip = "SetMousePosition 1," & result.x & _ "," & result.y
' Now complete the KnowBrainer command editor ' you may have to adjust the wait times below
'EmulateRecognition "New Application Command" HeardWord "New", "Application", "Command" Wait 1 SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.5 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.2 SendKeys clip Wait 0.2 SendKeys "~Wait 0.1~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "ButtonClick 1,1" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "%v" End Sub

Command.name: Shift Click
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys"+{ClickLeft}" End Sub

Command.name: Shift Tab <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type into
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{+Tab}" Wait 1 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) End Sub

Command.name: Shift Tab <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar1+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Shift Tab <1to20> <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type into
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{+Tab "+ListVar1+"}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar2 End Sub

Command.name: Shift Tab
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: Shift Enter
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Continue With <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End} " Wait 1 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) End Sub

Command.name: Fill Field
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "select","[","through","]" End Sub

Command.name: Go Delete <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Backspace 2}" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Go Copy <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Go Cut <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^x{Del}" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Pick <1to10>
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "%1" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "%2" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "%3" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "%4" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "%5" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "%6" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "%7" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "%8" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "%9" Wait 1 EmulateRecognition "end of paragraph" End Sub

Command.name: Finish <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) Wait 0.5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Train Word
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.5 Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgTrainWords,0,,0) Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%r" Wait 3 SendKeys "%s" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Train Any Word
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgTrainWords,0,,0) End Sub

Command.name: Go Select <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^f" Wait 0.3 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait .5 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Double List <Lett> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}+{Enter 2}" If ListVar1="a" then SendKeys "A" If ListVar1="be" then SendKeys "B" If ListVar1="see" then SendKeys "C" If ListVar1="Dee" then SendKeys "D" If ListVar1="E" then SendKeys "e" If ListVar1="F" then SendKeys "F" If ListVar1="gee" then SendKeys "G" If ListVar1="H" then SendKeys "H" If ListVar1="I" then SendKeys "I" If ListVar1="Jay" then SendKeys "J" If ListVar1="Kay" then SendKeys "K" If ListVar1="L" then SendKeys "L" If ListVar1="M" then SendKeys "M" If ListVar1="N" then SendKeys "N" If ListVar1="oh" then SendKeys "O" If ListVar1="pee" then SendKeys "P" If ListVar1="cue" then SendKeys "Q" If ListVar1="are" then SendKeys "E" If ListVar1="S" then SendKeys "S" If ListVar1="tea" then SendKeys "T" If ListVar1="you" then SendKeys "U" If ListVar1="V" then SendKeys "V" If ListVar1="W" then SendKeys "W" If ListVar1="X" then SendKeys "X" If ListVar1="why" then SendKeys "Y" If ListVar1="Z" then SendKeys "Z" Wait 0.6 SendKeys ". " Wait 1 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar2, 1)) & Mid(ListVar2, 2) End Sub

Command.name: Double List Roman <1to20>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter}{(}" If ListVar1 = "1" Then SendKeys "i" If ListVar1 = "2" Then SendKeys "ii" If ListVar1 = "3" Then SendKeys "iii" If ListVar1 = "4" Then SendKeys "iv" If ListVar1 = "5" Then SendKeys "v" If ListVar1 = "6" Then SendKeys "vi" If ListVar1 = "7" Then SendKeys "vii" If ListVar1 = "8" Then SendKeys "viii" If ListVar1 = "9" Then SendKeys "ix" If ListVar1 = "10" Then SendKeys "x" If ListVar1 = "11" Then SendKeys "xi" If ListVar1 = "12" Then SendKeys "xii" If ListVar1 = "13" Then SendKeys "xiii" If ListVar1 = "14" Then SendKeys "xiv" If ListVar1 = "15" Then SendKeys "xv" If ListVar1 = "16" Then SendKeys "xvi" If ListVar1 = "17" Then SendKeys "xvii" If ListVar1 = "18" Then SendKeys "xviii" If ListVar1 = "19" Then SendKeys "xix" If ListVar1 = "20" Then SendKeys "xx" SendKeys "{)} " Wait 0.5 HeardWord "\cap" End Sub

Command.name: List Small <Lett> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}+{Enter}{(}" If ListVar1="a" then SendKeys "a" If ListVar1="be" then SendKeys "b" If ListVar1="see" then SendKeys "c" If ListVar1="Dee" then SendKeys "d" If ListVar1="E." then SendKeys "e" If ListVar1="F." then SendKeys "f" If ListVar1="gee" then SendKeys "g" If ListVar1="H." then SendKeys "h" If ListVar1="I" then SendKeys "i" If ListVar1="Jay" then SendKeys "j" If ListVar1="Kay" then SendKeys "k" If ListVar1="L." then SendKeys "l" If ListVar1="M." then SendKeys "m" If ListVar1="N." then SendKeys "n" If ListVar1="oh" then SendKeys "o" If ListVar1="pee" then SendKeys "p" If ListVar1="cue" then SendKeys "q" If ListVar1="are" then SendKeys "r" If ListVar1="S." then SendKeys "s" If ListVar1="tea" then SendKeys "t" If ListVar1="you" then SendKeys "u" If ListVar1="V." then SendKeys "v" If ListVar1="W." then SendKeys "w" If ListVar1="X." then SendKeys "x" If ListVar1="why" then SendKeys "y" If ListVar1="Z." then SendKeys "z" SendKeys "{)} " Wait 1 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar2, 1)) & Mid(ListVar2, 2) End Sub

Command.name: Train Words
Command.content: '#Reference {5c486340-2f92-11d1-a47c-00a024a3a678}#1.0#0#C:\Program Files (x86)\Nuance\NaturallySpeaking13\Program\dnstk10.dll#Dragon NaturallySpeaking ActiveX Controls#DNSTools Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.5 Dim EngineControl As New DgnEngineControl EngineControl.DlgShow(dgndlgTrainWords,0,,0) Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%r" Wait 3 SendKeys "%s" Wait 1 SendKeys "{Right}" End Sub

Command.name: Read <Read>
Command.content: if _arg1 = "That" then SendKeys "" if _arg1 = "That Back" then SendKeys "" if _arg1 = "Document" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}" if _arg1 = "All" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+a}" if _arg1 = "Next Paragraph" then SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Down}{Ctrl+Shift+Up}" if _arg1 = "Previous Paragraph" then SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Down}{Ctrl+Shift+Down}" if _arg1 = "Line" then SendSystemKeys "{Home}{Shift+End}" if _arg1 = "Paragraph" then SendSystemKeys "{Ctrl+Down}{Ctrl+Shift+Up}" if _arg1 = "To Here" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+Shift+Home}" if _arg1 = "To End" then SendKeys "{Ctrl+Shift+End}" Wait 500 SendKeys "{Ctrl+c}" Wait 500 SendKeys "{Right}" Wait 250 TTSPlayString "" Wait 1000 SetMicrophone 1

Command.name: Period Paragraph <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "." Wait 0.1 SendKeys "+{Enter 2}" Wait 1 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) End Sub

Command.name: Emoji <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" SendKeys "{WindowsHold}." Wait 0.2 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Esc}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Show Clipboard
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{WindowsHold}v" End Sub

Command.name: Start Word
Command.content: Sub Main AppBringUp "C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\Word.lnk" Wait 6 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: Type <Direction> <1to20> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar3, 1)) & Mid(ListVar2, 2) & Mid(ListVar3, 2) Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "{Tab "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up "+ListVar2+"}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down "+ListVar2+"}" End Sub

Command.name: Type <Direction> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar2, 1)) & Mid(ListVar2, 2) & Mid(ListVar3, 2) Wait 0.5 if ListVar1 = "Left" then SendKeys "+{Tab}" if ListVar1 = "Right" then SendKeys "{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Up" Then SendKeys "{Up}" If ListVar1 = "Down" Then SendKeys "{Down}" End Sub

Command.name: Type All With <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.2 SendKeys UCase$(Left(ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) End Sub

Command.name: Type Space <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "{Space}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Type In <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type into
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Space}" End Sub

Command.name: Format <FontStyle>

Command.name: Type Out <dictation>
Command.content: 'Script by Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2019 & tweaked by Rüdiger Wilke 'if selecting a word by double-clicking on it or by voice the following script 'will check if it has a space after it and if it is capitalised and 'subsequently the text you are replacing it with will meet the same criteria. 'In other words the script will test the ambiguity of Dragon selection 'and replace the selected text with what you said in an appropriate format Sub Main Dim hasSpace As Boolean hasSpace = False 'copy the text selected Clipboard$("") 'Clear clipboard SendKeys "^c", 1 SendKeys "^c", 1 Wait 0.5 If Len( Clipboard$() ) = 0 Then Clipboard$(".") Wait 0.3 'work out the last character to see it as a space below lastCharacter = Mid$(Clipboard$(), Len (Clipboard$()),1) 'find out the first character to see if it is a capital letter below Wait 0.3 firstCharacter = Left(Clipboard$(),1) Wait 0.3 'now assign what you said as a replacement to the clipboard Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 'This line tests if the last character of the selected text is a space 'if it is it adds a space to the replacement text in the clipboard 'and it also sets the hasSpace to true if it is a space If (StrComp(lastCharacter, " ") = 0) Then Clipboard ListVar1 & " " hasSpace = True End If 'this line checks if the first letter of the selected text is a capital letter 'and if it is it will capitalise the text in the clipboard If firstCharacter = UCase(firstCharacter) Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) 'if also has a space at the end of it then a space will be added 'to the text in the clipboard as well Wait 0.3 If hasSpace = True Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) & " " Wait 0.3 End If End If SendKeys"^v" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End} " End Sub

Command.name: Type <dictation>
Command.content: 'Script by Lindsay Adam pcbyvoice 2019 & tweaked by Rüdiger Wilke 'if selecting a word by double-clicking on it or by voice the following script 'will check if it has a space after it and if it is capitalised and 'subsequently the text you are replacing it with will meet the same criteria. 'In other words the script will test the ambiguity of Dragon selection 'and replace the selected text with what you said in an appropriate format Sub Main Dim hasSpace As Boolean hasSpace = False 'copy the text selected Clipboard$("") 'Clear clipboard SendKeys "^c", 1 SendKeys "^c", 1 Wait 0.5 If Len( Clipboard$() ) = 0 Then Clipboard$(".") Wait 0.3 'work out the last character to see it as a space below lastCharacter = Mid$(Clipboard$(), Len (Clipboard$()),1) 'find out the first character to see if it is a capital letter below Wait 0.3 firstCharacter = Left(Clipboard$(),1) Wait 0.3 'now assign what you said as a replacement to the clipboard Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 'This line tests if the last character of the selected text is a space 'if it is it adds a space to the replacement text in the clipboard 'and it also sets the hasSpace to true if it is a space If (StrComp(lastCharacter, " ") = 0) Then Clipboard ListVar1 & " " hasSpace = True End If 'this line checks if the first letter of the selected text is a capital letter 'and if it is it will capitalise the text in the clipboard If firstCharacter = UCase(firstCharacter) Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) 'if also has a space at the end of it then a space will be added 'to the text in the clipboard as well Wait 0.3 If hasSpace = True Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) & " " Wait 0.3 End If End If SendKeys"^v" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left}{End}" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Left}{Right}" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^{Down} Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Left}{End}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^+{Left}" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%u" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.5 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 1 HeardWord "Go to Text" End Sub

Command.name: Play <dictation>
Command.description: Used to force dictation into any field you can type in and adds a extra space after your dication
Command.content:
' Declare keyboard events Windows API function Declare Function keybd_event Lib "user32.dll" (ByVal vKey As _ Long, bScan As Long, ByVal Flag As Long, ByVal exInfo As Long) As Long ' declare virtual key constant for the control key Const VK_CTRL = &h11
Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 Wait 1 SendKeys "{Down}" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Esc}" End Sub

Sub Main keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,0,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys"f" Wait 0.1 keybd_event(VK_CTRL,0,2,0) Wait 0.1 SendKeys ListVar1 End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^c" Wait 0.1 If ListVar1 = "Access" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Access" If ListVar1 = "Dragon Pad" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Excel" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Excel" If ListVar1 = "Google Chrome" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Google Chrome" If ListVar1 = "Front Page" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Front Page" If ListVar1 = "Firefox" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Firfox" If ListVar1 = "Internet Explorer" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Internet Explorer" If ListVar1 = "IE 7" Then AppSwapWith "IEXPLORE" If ListVar1 = "NaturallySpeaking" Then HeardWord "Start","DragonPad" If ListVar1 = "Next Window" Then SendKeys "%{Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Notepad" Then HeardWord "Start","Notepad" If ListVar1 = "One Note" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Onenote" If ListVar1 = "Other Window" Then SendKeys "%{Tab}" If ListVar1 = "Outlook" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Outlook" If ListVar1 = "Paint" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Paint" If ListVar1 = "Power Point" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft PowerPoint" If ListVar1 = "Previous Window" Then SendKeys "+{Alt+Esc}" If ListVar1 = "Publisher" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Publisher" If ListVar1 = "QuickBooks" Then HeardWord "switch","to","QuickBooks" If ListVar1 = "Word" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Microsoft Word" If ListVar1 = "Wordpad" Then HeardWord "switch","to","Wordpad" If ListVar1 = "WordPerfect" Then HeardWord "switch","to","WordPerfect" Wait 2 SendKeys "^v Wait 0.1 SendKeys "{Enter}" End Sub

Command.name: New Folder <dictation>

Command.name: Change <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace <dog> With <cat> to replace the last occurrence of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "to") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 3, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies everything to the clipboard for processing Wait 1.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the end of the document End End Sub

Command.name: Replace <dictation>
Command.description: Example: Say "Replace All <dog> With <cat> to replace all occurrences of the word "dog" with "cat"
Command.content:
Sub Main Dim newPhrase As String Dim phraseToReplace As String
On Error Resume Next 'Finds the location of the magic trigger word "with" which separates the phrase that needs to be replaced with the phrase that replaces it index = InStr(CStr(ListVar1), "with") 'This is the variable into which the phrase to be replaced goes phraseToReplace = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), 1, index - 2) 'This is the variable into which the new phrase goes newPhrase = Mid$(CStr(ListVar1), index + 5, Len(CStr(ListVar1)) - index + 5) SendKeys "^a" 'Selects everything Wait 1.5 SendKeys "^c" 'Copies the selection to the clipboard for processing Wait 2.5 testPhrase = Clipboard$() 'Dumps the clipboard into this variable newString = Replace$(testPhrase, phraseToReplace, newPhrase) 'Makes the replacement and places the corrected phrase in this variable Clipboard newString 'Places the corrected phrase in the clipboard for pasting in the next command below SendKeys "^v" Wait 1 SendKeys "{End}" 'Go back to the bottom of the document to continue dictating End End Sub

Command.name: Save To <ComputerFolder> As <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%f" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "a" Wait 0.2 Str = ListVar2 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "^l" Wait 0.5 If ListVar1 = "Documents" Then SendKeys "documents" If ListVar1 = "My Documents" Then SendKeys "documents" If ListVar1 = "Desktop" then SendKeys "desktop" If ListVar1 = "Downloads" then SendKeys "downloads" If ListVar1 = "Music" then SendKeys "music" If ListVar1 = "Pictures" then SendKeys "pictures" If ListVar1 = "Photographs" then SendKeys "pictures" If ListVar1 = "Videos" then SendKeys "videos" If ListVar1 = "AppData" then SendKeys "AppData" If ListVar1 = "OneDrive" then SendKeys "OneDrive" If ListVar1 = "Favorites" then SendKeys "Favorites" Wait 1 SendKeys "~" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%s" End Sub

Command.name: <Tabs>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "+{Tab}" if ListVar1 = "Applications" then SendKeys "{Home}" if ListVar1 = "Processes" then SendKeys "{Home}{Right}" if ListVar1 = "Services" then SendKeys "{Home}{Right 2}" if ListVar1 = "Performance" then SendKeys "{Home}{Right 3}" if ListVar1 = "Users" then SendKeys "{End}" if ListVar1 = "Networking" then SendKeys "{End}{Left}" SendKeys "{Tab}" End Sub

Command.name: End Process
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%e" Wait .5 SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "1" then SendKeys "%s" if ListVar1 = "2" then SendKeys "{Down}%e}" if ListVar1 = "3" then SendKeys "{Down 2}%e}" if ListVar1 = "4" then SendKeys "{Down 3}%e}" if ListVar1 = "5" then SendKeys "{Down 4}%e}" if ListVar1 = "6" then SendKeys "{Down 5}%e}" if ListVar1 = "7" then SendKeys "{Down 6}%e}" if ListVar1 = "8" then SendKeys "{Down 7}%e}" if ListVar1 = "9" then SendKeys "{Down 8}%e}" if ListVar1 = "10" then SendKeys "{Down 9}%e}" End Sub

Command.name: Train <1to10>
Command.content: If _arg1 = "1" Then HeardWord "select","one" If _arg1 = "2" Then HeardWord "select","two" If _arg1 = "3" Then HeardWord "select","three" If _arg1 = "4" Then HeardWord "select","four" If _arg1 = "5" Then HeardWord "select","five" If _arg1 = "6" Then HeardWord "select","six" If _arg1 = "7" Then HeardWord "select","seven" If _arg1 = "8" Then HeardWord "select","eight" If _arg1 = "9" Then HeardWord "select","nine" If _arg1 = "10" Then HeardWord "select","ten" Wait 200 SendKeys "{Alt+t}" Wait 500 SendKeys "{Alt+r}" Wait 3000 SendKeys "{Alt+s}"

Command.name: Color <Color> <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main HeardWord "select", ListVar2 Wait .5 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "f" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "%c" Wait 0.7 If ListVar1 = "Black" then SendKeys "{Home}" If ListVar1 = "White" then SendKeys "{End}" If ListVar1 = "Grey" then SendKeys "{Home}gg" If ListVar1 = "Purple" then SendKeys "{Home}p" If ListVar1 = "Blue" then SendKeys "{Home}b" If ListVar1 = "Green" then SendKeys "{Home}g" If ListVar1 = "Yellow" then SendKeys "{Home}y" If ListVar1 = "Pink" then SendKeys "{Home}f" If ListVar1 = "Red" then SendKeys "{Home}r" Wait 0.3 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.5 EmulateRecognition "go back" End Sub

Command.name: Color <Color>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "f" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%c" Wait 0.3 If ListVar1 = "Black" then SendKeys "{Home}" If ListVar1 = "White" then SendKeys "{End}" If ListVar1 = "Grey" then SendKeys "{Home}gg" If ListVar1 = "Purple" then SendKeys "p" If ListVar1 = "Red" then SendKeys "r" If ListVar1 = "Blue" then SendKeys "{Home}b" If ListVar1 = "Green" then SendKeys "{Home}g" If ListVar1 = "Yellow" then SendKeys "y" Wait 0.6 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Color All <Color>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%o" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "f" Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%c" Wait 0.3 If ListVar1 = "Black" then SendKeys "{Home}" If ListVar1 = "White" then SendKeys "{End}" If ListVar1 = "Grey" then SendKeys "{Home}gg" If ListVar1 = "Purple" then SendKeys "p" If ListVar1 = "Red" then SendKeys "r" If ListVar1 = "Blue" then SendKeys "{Home}b" If ListVar1 = "Green" then SendKeys "{Home}g" If ListVar1 = "Yellow" then SendKeys "y" Wait 0.6 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: always testing <1to4> <1to9> <1to9> <New Names>

Command.name: <FontColor> Back
Command.content: Sub Main if ListVar1 = "Red" then HeardWord "color","it","red" if ListVar1 = "Yellow" then HeardWord "color","it","yellow" if ListVar1 = "Green" then HeardWord "color","it","green" if ListVar1 = "Black" then HeardWord "color","it","black" if ListVar1 = "Blue" then HeardWord "color","it","blue" if ListVar1 = "Purple" then HeardWord "color","it","purple" Wait 1 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}{Esc}" End Sub

Command.name: Color <Color>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "^d" Wait 0.4 SendKeys "%c" Wait 0.2 If ListVar1 = "Black" then SendKeys "{Home}" If ListVar1 = "White" then SendKeys "{End}" If ListVar1 = "Grey" then SendKeys "{Home}gg" If ListVar1 = "Purple" then SendKeys "p" If ListVar1 = "Red" then SendKeys "r" If ListVar1 = "Blue" then SendKeys "{Home}b" If ListVar1 = "Green" then SendKeys "{Home}g" If ListVar1 = "Yellow" then SendKeys "y" Wait 0.6 SendKeys "{Enter}" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^{Down}{Left 2}{End}" End Sub

Command.name: Box <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main Dim hasSpace As Boolean hasSpace = False 'copy the text selected Clipboard$("") 'Clear clipboard SendKeys "^c", 1 If Len( Clipboard$() ) = 0 Then Clipboard$(".") Wait 0.3 'work out the last character to see it as a space below lastCharacter = Mid$(Clipboard$(), Len (Clipboard$()),1) 'find out the first character to see if it is a capital letter below Wait 0.3 firstCharacter = Left(Clipboard$(),1) Wait 0.3 'now assign what you said as a replacement to the clipboard Clipboard ListVar1 Wait 0.1 'This line tests if the last character of the selected text is a space 'if it is it adds a space to the replacement text in the clipboard 'and it also sets the hasSpace to true if it is a space If (StrComp(lastCharacter, " ") = 0) Then Clipboard ListVar1 & " " hasSpace = True End If 'this line checks if the first letter of the selected text is a capital letter 'and if it is it will capitalise the text in the clipboard If firstCharacter = UCase(firstCharacter) Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) 'if also has a space at the end of it then a space will be added 'to the text in the clipboard as well Wait 0.3 If hasSpace = True Then Clipboard UCase(Left (ListVar1, 1)) & Mid(ListVar1, 2) & " " Wait 1 EmulateRecognition "restore box" Wait 1 EmulateRecognition "paste box" End If End If End Sub

Command.name: Command Name <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "^a" Wait 0.5 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 1 SendKeys "%t" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^{End}{Up 2}{End}{Left}" End Sub

Command.name: Command Name <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%n" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "^a" Wait 1 Str = ListVar1 arrStr = Split(Str," ") For i=0 To UBound(arrStr) word = LCase(Trim(arrStr(i))) word = Replace(word,Mid(word,1,1),Chr(Asc(Mid(word,1,1))-32),1,1) str1 = str1 & word & " " Next SendKeys str1 Wait 0.5 SendKeys "%t" End Sub

Command.name: With <dictation>

Command.name: View Week
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%v" Wait 0.2 SendKeys "w1" End Sub

Command.name: View Day
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "r" End Sub

Command.name: View Month
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "t" End Sub

Command.name: View Work Week
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "k" End Sub

Command.name: Week
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "w1" End Sub

Command.name: Work Week
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "%v" Wait 0.1 SendKeys "k" End Sub

Command.name: Open
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "~" End Sub

Command.name: Delete 2 <dictation>
Command.content: Sub Main MsgBox "Delete selected item?" If MsgBox("Click OK",vbOkCancel) = vbOK Then Debug.Print "OK was pressed" Else Debug.Print "Cancel was pressed" End If Wait 0.2 SendKeys "{Del}" End Sub

Command.name: Test Example 1
Command.content: Sub Main SendKeys "this is the 1st test" End Sub
